attributes.action: Make ALL recycling centres in uk to have a container for ALL working electricals
attributes.additional_details: Stop rubbish being sold and being ripped off..
attributes.background: Stop the sales of "made to break" electrical goods in uk, items over certain price must come with min 3 year easy guarantee and ALL recycling centres to have containers for fully working items that can be given FREE to hard up familys

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local recycling facilities are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for changes to consumer rights for certain electrical products.
